description: This file defines a React functional component named DeviceFilters, which provides a user interface for filtering and sorting devices based on search query, type, status, and sort options. It includes form controls such as input fields and select dropdowns, styled with inline styles, and exports the component as the default export.

methods.name: DeviceFilters
methods.description: React functional component rendering device filter controls with props for search, type, status, and sorting options.
